item.title: But is crypto the future or not?
item.description: TL;DR: YES. Introduction I first became interested in cryptocurrencies in the 2010s. At that time, Bitcoin was probably the only one, or at least the only one I knew of. I found it fascinating, but I couldn’t quite grasp what it was exactly. A kind of digital money? How does it work? Where is this money actually located? And is it really money? Can I convert Bitcoin into euros? And if so, how?
